```{r}
# Setup Chunk

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)

# import datasets
gdata <- read.csv("antiworkgrowthdata.csv", na = "NA")

```

```{r}
g <- function(list){as.Date(list[c(TRUE,FALSE)],format='%m/%d/%Y')}
Date <- strsplit(gdata$Data_Collected_At, ' ')
Date <- lapply(Date,g)

gdata <- gdata %>%
  mutate('Date' = do.call('c',Date))


```





```{r}

ggplot(gdata, aes(x = gdata$Date,y = gdata$Users)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.5, color = ) 

ggplot(gdata , aes(x = gdata$Date,y = gdata$Posts)) +
  geom_line()

ggplot(gdata , aes(x = gdata$Date,y = gdata$Comments)) +
  geom_line()
```
